item.title: 数据疲软，交易员押注美联储大幅降息，美国收益率下滑
item.description: 周一，美国国债收益率暴跌，因为交易商开始为美联储大幅降息定价，此前疲软的就业数据加剧了人们对美国经济可能走向衰退的担忧。【原文：U.S. Treasury yields tumbled on Monday as traders moved to price in big rate cuts from the Federal Reserve, after weak jobs data stoked worries that the U.S. economy could be heading for a recession.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片初创公司 Groq 最新一轮融资后估值达 28 亿美元
item.description: 半导体初创公司 Groq 周一表示，在由思科投资公司（Cisco Investments）、三星催化剂基金（Samsung Catalyst Fund）和贝莱德私募股权合伙公司（BlackRock Private Equity Partners）等领投的 D 轮融资中，该公司已筹集到 6.4 亿美元，估值达到 28 亿美元。【原文：Semiconductor startup Groq said on Monday it has raised $640 million in a Series D funding round led by Cisco Investments, Samsung Catalyst Fund and BlackRock Private Equity Partners, among others, bringing its valuation to $2.8 billion.】

item.title: 美国经济衰退担忧引发全球股市大跌，新兴市场股市暴跌
item.description: 周一，由于对美国经济衰退的担忧引发全球股市大跌，投资者纷纷转向日元等更安全的资产，全球新兴市场股市暴跌。【原文：Emerging market equities around the world tumbled on Monday, as fears of a recession in the United States sparked a global selloff and sent investors running for safer assets like the Japanese yen.】

item.title: Cemex 将以 9.5 亿美元的价格剥离多米尼加业务
item.description: 墨西哥水泥生产商 Cemex 周一宣布以约 9.5 亿美元的价格将其在多米尼加共和国的业务出售给 Cementos Progreso 和战略合作伙伴。【原文：Mexican cement maker Cemex on Monday announced the sale of its operations in the Dominican Republic to Cementos Progreso and strategic partners for about $950 million.】

item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官竞选人称市场复苏期间竞争激烈
item.description: 摩根大通的投资者们正在猜测谁将最终接替杰米-戴蒙出任首席执行官，其中两位竞争者表示，他们更专注于赢得市场份额和培养银行未来的领导者。【原文：As JPMorgan Chase investors puzzle over who will eventually replace Jamie Dimon as CEO, two of the contenders say they are more focused on winning market share and developing the bank's future leaders.】

item.title: 早间竞价：股市因 "R "字回归而下跌，日经指数下跌 12
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 礼来和诺和诺德在药店货架上展开减肥市场争夺战
item.description: 随着礼来公司的减肥药 Zepbound 在美国市场与诺和诺德公司的 Wegovy 展开竞争，一些医生表示，他们开处方的指导原则很简单：我的病人究竟能在药店买到哪种药？【原文：As Eli Lilly's weight-loss drug Zepbound gains ground in the U.S. against Novo Nordisk's Wegovy, some doctors say their guiding principle for writing prescriptions is simple: which drug can my patients actually get at the pharmacy?】

item.title: 美国农民在 "丢人大甩卖 "中出售廉价农作物，Bunge 和 ADM 将从中受益
item.description: 美国农民需要为秋收腾出储藏空间，低价出售农作物的激增可能会提高 Archer-Daniels-Midland 和邦吉全球（Bunge Global）等谷物加工企业的盈利能力。【原文：A spike in bargain-basement crop sales by U.S. farmers needing to make room in storage bins for autumn harvests could boost profitability at grain handlers such as Archer-Daniels-Midland and Bunge Global .】

item.title: 半导体集团称欧盟应限制对外投资
item.description: 半导体行业组织欧洲半导体协会（SEMI Europe）周一呼吁欧盟尽可能减少对集团内公司对外投资外国计算机芯片技术的限制。【原文：Semiconductor industry group SEMI Europe called on the European Union on Monday to place as few restrictions as possible on outbound investment in foreign computer chip technology by companies based in the bloc.】

item.title: 第二季度亏损翻了两番，BioNTech 寄希望于向抗癌药物转型
item.description: 德国制药商生物技术公司（BioNTech）周一表示，由于其 COVID-19 疫苗的销售急剧下降，该公司将战略重点转向新的癌症治疗，因此第二季度的亏损额比去年同期翻了两番。【原文：Losses at German drugmaker BioNTech quadrupled in the second quarter from a year earlier, the company said on Monday, as it banks on a strategy shift towards new cancer treatments following a sharp drop-off in sales of its COVID-19 vaccine.】

item.title: 凯雷第二季度利润低于预期
item.description: 私募股权公司凯雷集团周一报告称，第二季度可分配利润同比下降 11.7%，降幅高于预期，原因是创纪录的管理费和交易费收入未能抵消业绩费的大幅下降。【原文：Private equity firm Carlyle Group reported a larger-than expected 11.7% year-on-year drop in second-quarter distributable earnings on Monday, as record revenue from management and transaction fees did not offset a big drop in performance fees.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，本田季度营业利润将突破 30 亿美元
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周一报道，受美国混合动力汽车销售强劲的推动，日本本田汽车公司第一季度合并营业利润将超过 4,500 亿日元（约合 31.7 亿美元）。【原文：Japan's Honda Motor will report consolidated first-quarter operating profit of more than 450 billion yen ($3.17 billion), boosted by strong U.S. hybrid vehicle sales, the Nikkei newspaper reported on Monday.】

item.title: U.S. futures tumble as recession fears grip investors
item.description: 美国股指期货周一暴跌，与纳斯达克指数挂钩的股指期货下跌近 4%，因为对美国陷入衰退的担忧在全球市场激起波澜。【原文：U.S. stock index futures tumbled on Monday, with those tied to the Nasdaq falling nearly 4%, as fears of the United States slipping into a recession rippled through global markets.】

item.title: 日本日经指数创 1987 年黑色星期一以来最大跌幅
item.description: 受上周全球股市暴跌、经济忧虑以及由廉价日元资助的投资被平仓的担忧影响，日本股市周一崩盘，创下自 1987 年黑色星期一抛售以来的最大单日跌幅。【原文：Japanese stocks collapsed on Monday in their biggest single day rout since the 1987 Black Monday sell-offs, driven by last week's plunge in global stock markets, economic concerns and worries investments funded by a cheap yen were being unwound.】

item.title: 雨果博斯将俄罗斯业务出售给批发合作伙伴 Stockmann
item.description: 德国时尚品牌雨果-博斯（Hugo Boss）周一表示，已将其俄罗斯业务出售给批发合作伙伴斯托克曼公司（Stockmann），具体价格未透露，雨果-博斯加入了因乌克兰战争而退出俄罗斯市场的西方品牌行列。【原文：Hugo Boss has sold its Russian business to wholesale partner Stockmann for an undisclosed fee, the German fashion house said on Monday, joining the ranks of Western brands to exit the Russian market over the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 瑞士联合银行拒绝就近期瑞郎升值发表评论
item.description: 瑞士央行发言人周一表示，瑞士国家银行对近期瑞郎升值不予置评。【原文：The Swiss National Bank has no comment on the recent appreciation in the Swiss franc currency, a spokesperson for the central bank said on Monday.】

item.title: 台股因科技股恐慌下跌 8.4%，预计将进一步走弱
item.description: 台湾股市周一创纪录地暴跌 8.4%，包括台积电在内的科技股下滑，原因是投资者受到美国经济前景不佳的影响，抛售了亚洲表现最好的市场之一。【原文：Taiwan stocks plunged a record 8.4% on Monday, with tech stocks including TSMC sliding as investors spooked by a poor outlook for the U.S. economy sold off one of Asia's top performing markets.】

item.title: 黄金屡创新高或将抑制需求罗素
item.description: 今年迄今为止，黄金是表现最突出的商品，涨幅达 18.5%，并创下历史新高。【原文：Gold has been the standout commodity performer so far this year, gaining 18.5% and posting a record high.】

item.title: 独家报道中国企业荣耀在准备上市之际获得国家大力支持
item.description: 据政策文件和一位接近此事的人士透露，中国智能手机制造商荣耀正从地方政府支持者那里获得异乎寻常的高水平支持，因为这家前华为（HWT.UL）部门正在准备首次公开募股（IPO）。【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Honor is receiving an unusually high level of support from local government backers, as the former Huawei (HWT.UL) unit prepares an initial public offering (IPO), according to policy documents and a person close to the matter.】

item.title: 早晨的竞标沐浴在红色的海洋中
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 投资者对市场抛售的评论
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市暴跌，债券反弹，因为投资者担心美国可能走向衰退，纷纷逃离风险资产，同时赌利率必须迅速下降才能挽救经济增长。【原文：Share markets tumbled and bonds rallied in Asia on Monday as fears the United States could be heading for recession sent investors rushing from risk assets while wagering interest rates will have to fall rapidly to rescue growth.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 称达美航空网络故障不应归咎于它
item.description: CrowdStrike 周日在给达美航空的回复中表示，7 月 19 日的全球故障导致 800 多万台电脑崩溃，达美航空的航班中断不应归咎于这家网络安全公司。【原文：CrowdStrike said on Sunday in a response to Delta Airlines that the cybersecurity firm should not be blamed for the carrier's flight disruptions following the July 19 global outage that crashed more than 8 million computers.】

item.title: 财新PMI显示中国服务业活动进一步扩张，但外部需求放缓
item.description: 周一的一项私营企业调查显示，在新订单的帮助下，中国服务业活动在7月份加速增长，尽管海外需求的增长势头放缓至11个月来最慢的速度。【原文：Growth in China's services activity accelerated in July helped by new orders, although momentum in overseas demand eased to its slowest pace in 11 months, a private-sector survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 美国经济衰退担忧抵消中东紧张局势，石油徘徊在 8 个月低点
item.description: 加沙的持续战事为价格提供了支撑。【原文：Prices were supported by persistent fighting in Gaza.】

item.title: 美国经济放缓担忧持续，日元升至 7 个月高点
item.description: 周一亚洲开盘时，日元兑美元汇率触及1月中旬高点，市场延续了上周疲软的美国劳动力数据引发的衰退忧虑和美联储更大幅度降息的预期。【原文：Japan's yen hit mid-January highs against the dollar at Asia open on Monday, as markets extended moves triggered last week after weak U.S. labour data stoked recession worries and expectations of deeper rate cuts by the Fed.】

item.title: 会议记录显示，日本央行在 6 月向鹰派倾斜，并就通胀风险展开辩论
item.description: 周一的会议记录显示，日本央行的九名董事会成员中至少有两人在六月份的政策会议上呼吁提前加息，这凸显了该央行的鹰派倾向，为未来进一步加息提供了空间。【原文：At least two of the Bank of Japan's nine board members called for an early interest rate increase at a policy meeting in June, minutes showed on Monday, underlining the central bank's hawkish tilt that provides scope for further hikes ahead.】

item.title: 日本 7 月服务业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示服务业活动在下滑后反弹
item.description: 周一的一项调查显示，得益于稳健的国内需求，日本服务业活动在 7 月份恢复了增长，但缓慢的海外订单和有增无减的成本压力继续挤压着企业。【原文：Japan's service-sector activity returned to growth in July thanks to solid domestic demand, a survey showed on Monday, but slow overseas orders and unabated cost pressures continue to squeeze businesses.】

item.title: 中国恒大电动汽车部门进入破产重组程序
item.description: 中国恒大新能源汽车公司周一称，当地法院已裁定该公司两家单位应进入破产重组程序，一周前，这两家单位的个别债权人已申请进入破产重组程序。【原文：China Evergrande New Energy Vehicle said on Monday a local court had ruled that two of its units should enter into bankruptcy and be reorganised, a week after individual creditors of the units filed for such proceedings.】

item.title: 股市受美国经济衰退担忧影响，债券为降息定价
item.description: 周一，亚洲主要股指全线飘红，原因是市场担心美国可能会走向衰退，从而引发了大规模的避险情绪，同时也在赌利率必须迅速大幅下降，以支持经济增长。【原文：Major share indices were deep in the red in Asia on Monday as fears the United States could be heading for recession triggered mass risk aversion and wagers interest rates will have to fall sharply, and quickly, to support growth.】
